name: Work N Hire
overview:
Work N Hire is India’s First Online Marketplace to Bring Clients and Freelancers under one roof.

Its an online portal targetted for Indian Customers, wherein small business/ startups can post their job requirements for free and Freelancers/Contractors can submit proposals for filling up to those job requirements. Once the job is awarded to the freelancer the client can then manage the project through the Project Workroom on Work N Hire by raising invoices, uploading files, sending messages, and creating terms and Milestones.

The site has been created keeping in mind the requirements for an Indian Market and caters to the following categories, IT & Programming, Graphic Design & Multimedia, Content Writing, Data Entry, Sales & Marketing, Customer Service, Finance & Accounting.
